feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-22T02:23:18.428695Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Llama：添加基于语法的采样</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T21 ：22：07.768067Z </更新>; <link href =“https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773”/>; <作者>; <name>;davepeck</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=davepeck</uri>; </author>; <content type =“html”>;<img src =“https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/242054” 3/250365685-5bd15da2-78c1-4625-be90-1e938e6823f1.gif"样式="宽度：220像素；高度：110像素；" />;<br />;本文介绍了一个 API，它采用序列化的上下文无关语法来指导和约束采样。它还提供了一个类似 Backus-Naur 形式 (BNF) 的语法示例，用于指定生成的语法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama-add-grammar-based-sampling" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36819906" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 Windows NT 网络配置中使用 Prolog (1996)</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20030218034509/http://www.research.microsoft.com/research/dtg/davidhov/pap.htm</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T01:22:07.938566Z</updated>; < link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20030218034509/http://www.research.microsoft.com/research/dtg/davidhov/pap.htm"/>; <author>; <name>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Microsoft 的 Windows NT 操作系统使用嵌入式 Prolog 解释器来配置其局域网和广域网系统。描述了解决管道问题的算法，包括其正向和负向约束、Prolog 数据库和效率考虑。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#using-prolog-in-windows-nt-network-configuration-1996" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821871" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MiniZinc</stitle>; <id>;https://www.minizinc.org/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T19:22:07.940320Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.minizinc.org/"/>; <作者>; <name>;gavi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gavi</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.minizinc.org/MiniZn_logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;MiniZinc 是一种高级建模语言，可让您对约束满足和优化问题进行建模。它提供了一个大型的预定义约束库，可以编译成 FlatZinc，这是一种许多解算器都能理解的解算器输入语言。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#minizinc" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817628" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Web 环境界面grity API提案</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/RupertBenWiser/Web-Environment-Integrity</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T18:22:07.941283Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/RupertBenWiser/Web-Environment-Integrity"/>; <author>; <name>;reactormonk</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=reactormonk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/3e5746f7427e9d6ea003ffda42275633b139b5a896d712bbc80935e54957816b/RupertBenWiser/Web-En vironment-Integrity" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;此存储库详细介绍了添加新 API 以确定 Web 环境完整性的提案：<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#web-environment-integrity-api-proposal" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817305" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;用恐怖小店管理厨房果蝇</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.zaccohn.com/Fruitflies-and-the-Little-Shop-of-Horrors/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:22:07.942148Z</updated>; < link href="https://blog.zaccohn.com/Fruitflies-and-the-Little-Shop-of-Horrors/"/>; <author>; <name>;zacharycohn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zacharycohn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.zaccohn.com/images/blog_pitcherplants.jpeg" style="width ：220px；高度：124px；” />;<br />;每年夏天，作者的厨房尽管定期清洁，但果蝇却出没。他们尝试使用陷阱，但发现它们难看。然后他们发现了肉食性猪笼草，特别是紫猪笼草，它可以有效控制果蝇的数量。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#managing-kitchen-fruit-flies-with-a-little-shop-of-horrors" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820469" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NativePHP：使用 PHP 构建桌面应用程序的框架</stitle>; <id>;https://nativephp.com/docs/1/getting-started/introduction</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:22:07.942851Z</updated>; <link href="https://nativephp.com/docs/1/getting-started/introduction"/>; <author>; <name>;brysonreece</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=brysonreece</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;NativePHP 是一个新框架，用于使用 PHP 快速构建丰富的本机桌面应用程序。它使 PHP 开发人员能够使用熟悉的工具和技术创建跨平台的本机应用程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nativephp-a-framework-for-building-desktop-apps-using-php" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820555" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Primo – 带有 Svelte 块、代码编辑器和 SSG 的可视化 CMS</stitle>; <id>;https://primocms.org</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T13:22:07.943523Z</updated>; <link href="https://primocms.org"/>; <author>; <name>;mmmateo</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=mmmateo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://kdtzsoeklezpgshpzqtf.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/public/images/7c1dc1a3-c9eb-4364-b31b-951ecfc2641d/1682111950401Screen%2 0Shot%202023-04-21%20at%205.17.27%20PM.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：122px；" />;<br />;邀请任意数量的协作者作为开发人员或内容编辑者，并一起编辑您的页面。在单个服务器上创建无限数量的网站并在几秒钟内启动新网站。将您的站点部署到 Github 存储库。从那里您可以轻松地将其部署到任何网络主机。使用 Primo 的免费主题之一开始运行，并使用 CSS 变量在几秒钟内对其进行自定义。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-primo-a-visual-cms-with-svelte-blocks-a-code-editor-and-ssg" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36813086" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry ry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;对于 BSD Unix，这是 Sayonara (1992)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tech-insider.org/unix/research/1992/0622.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T19:22:07.944228Z</updated>; <link href=" https://www.tech-insider.org/unix/research/1992/0622.html"/>; <author>; <name>;operator-name</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=operator-name</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;BSD Unix 的最终版本标志着加州大学伯克利分校参与操作系统业务的结束。 BSD Unix 自 1988 年以来因其无需许可费和尖端技术而在学术界广受欢迎。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#for-bsd-unix-it-s-sayon​​ara-1992" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817482" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;书评：交易法则</stitle>; <id>;https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/your-book-review-the-laws-of-trading</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:22:07.944929Z</updated>; <link href="https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/your-book-review -the-laws-of-trading"/>; <作者>; <name>;feross</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=feross</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post -media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F4c83fb0a-dce8-47ca-9dd7-276236fa4a69_1200x742.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：137px；" />;<br />;奥古斯丁·勒布朗的《交易法则》是一本结合了交易、哲学和决策的独特书籍。勒布朗将金融市场视为一个竞争环境，参与者必须适应，否则就会死亡。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#book-review-the-laws-of-trading" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820105" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;《魔兽世界》玩家欺骗 AI 抓取网站发布废话</stitle>; <id>;https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2023/07/21/world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-games-website-into-publishing-nonsense/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T17:22:07 .946367Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2023/07/21/world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-games-website-into-publishing-nonsense/"/>; <作者>; <name>;mikhael</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mikhael</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/60405e99c4959a8b4cd30b0e/400x0.jpg?cropX1=0&cropX2=1080&cropY1=0&cropY2=1080" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Reddit 魔兽世界子版块发现一个网站正在抓取他们的帖子并使用人工智能来生成文章。作为回应，Reddit 用户创建了一个关于游戏中不存在的功能的假帖子，并且该网站发布了一篇基于该帖子的文章。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-website-into-publishing-nonsense" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815744" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;记者应对包括科学家在内的所有来源保持怀疑</stitle>; <id>;https://natesilver.substack.com/p/journalists-should-be-skeptical-of</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T20:22:07.947073Z</updated>; <link href="https://natesilver. substack.com/p/journalists-should-be-skeptical-of"/>; <作者>; <name>;amadeuspagel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=amadeuspagel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:ste ep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2e937c74-f2b6-478a-aa5d-c485635efa71_820x385.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：104px；" />;<br />;一组科学家在《自然医学》杂志上发表了一篇关于 COVID-19 起源的论文，该论文与他们的真实信念相矛盾，并误导了公众。作者操纵媒体叙事，并受到职业影响和政治强烈反对的动机。记者应该对所有消息来源保持怀疑，包括科学家。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#journalists-should-be-be-be-sketical-of----------------------- >; </content>; </entry>; <输入xml：base =“ https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml”>; <Title type type type =“ text”>; rfc 9420 aka Mesidage Lease Security </stitle>; </stitle>; <ID>; ：07.947848z </更新>; <link href =“ https://blog.phnx.im/rfc-9420-mls/”/>; <uname>; <Name>; g src =“ https://blog.phnx.im/content/images/size/w960/2023/07/header-mls-rfc.png“ style =” width：220px; height; height; height; height; 134px;'' />;<br />;消息层安全 (MLS) 协议以 RFC 9420 的形式发布，是第一个标准化且完全指定的端到端加密协议。它在可扩展性和效率方面对现有协议进行了改进。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rfc-9420-aka-messaging-layer-security" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815705" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Slackware Linux 发行版 30 岁了</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/20/slackware_turns_30/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T19:22:07.949314Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/20/ slackware_turns_30/"/>; <作者>; <name>;akoster</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=akoster</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2023/07/19/slack-15-boot.png?x=648&y=360&infer_y=1" style="width: 220 px；高度：123px；" />;<br />;Slackware Linux 项目正在庆祝其成立 30 周年。它是仍在积极维护和开发的最古老的 Linux 发行版。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#slackware-linux-distribution-turns-30-years-old" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818233" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;不要取笑著名的丹·布朗 (2013)</stitle>; <id>;https://onehundredpages.wordpress.com/2013/06/12/dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T20:22:07.952386Z</updated>; <link href="https ://onehundredpages.wordpress.com/2013/06/12/dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown/"/>; <author>; <name>;codetrotter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=codetrotter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;著名作家丹·布朗醒来时很生气，因为他知道他的新书会受到评论家的攻击。尽管受到批评，他的经纪人还是让他放心，并意识到他数以百万计的粉丝和财富比少数批评者的意见更重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818501" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我用 Rust 编写了一个 JVM</stitle>; <id>;https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T09:22:07.953094Z</updated>; <link href="https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/ 07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/"/>; <author>; <name>;lukastyrychtr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lukastyrychtr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://andreabergia.com/images/2023/07/gc1.png" style="width: 220px; height: 1 03px；” />;<br />;我用 Rust 编写了一个 Java 虚拟机，称为 rjvm。它是一个出于学习目的而构建的玩具 JVM，而不是一个严肃的实现。它支持执行字节码指令、处理局部变量和堆栈元素以及调用方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;FreeWilly 1 和 2，两个新的开放获取法学硕士</stitle>; <id>;https://stability.ai/blog/freewilly-large-instruction-fine-tuned-models</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T20:22:07.954506Z</updated>; <link href="https://stability.ai/blog/freewilly-large-instruction-fine-tuned -models"/>; <author>; <name>;anigbrowl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anigbrowl</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6213c340453c3f502425776e/29202f99-d2d9-412f- 8aeb-f2881514b920/Arcane_magic_with_an_orca_whale_swimming_in_the_galaxy_filled_with_vibrant_stars_steps-40_style-Pixel_Art_seed-0ts-1689963125_idx-0.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Stability AI 及其 CarperAI 实验室发布了 FreeWilly1 和 FreeWilly2，这两个新的开放访问大型语言模型 (LLM) 展示了卓越的推理能力。这些模型是在非商业许可下发布的研究实验。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#freewilly-1-and-2-two-new-open-access-llms" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818923" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;IMAX 模拟 PalmPilot 软件为 Oppenheimer 的 70 毫米版本提供动力</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/imax-emulates-palmpilot-software-to-power-oppenheimers-70-mm-release/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T19:22:07.95 5279Z</updated>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/imax-emulates-palmpilot-software-to-power-oppenheimers-70-mm-release/"/>; <author>; <name>;riffraff</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=riffraff</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/oppenheimer-800x362.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：100px；" />;<br />;IMAX 发布了 70 毫米格式的电影《奥本海默》，这是自 2020 年《信条》以来首部 70 毫米 IMAX 电影。该电影在 PalmPilot 模拟器上运行，特别是 Palm m130，它被用作运行 70 毫米电影的控制器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#imax-emulates-palmpilot-software-to-power-oppenheimers-70-mm-release" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817900" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在法学硕士领域，“开源”被用来表示“可下载权重”</stitle>; <id>;https://www.alessiofanelli.com/blog/llama2-isnt-open-source</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T16:22:07.956661Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.aless iofanelli.com/blog/llama2-isnt-open-source"/>; <author>; <name>;FanaHOVA</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=FanaHOVA</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.alessiofanelli.com/images/open-models.png" style="width: 220px; height: 112px;" />;<br />;LLaMA2 是一种因滥用“开源”一词而受到批评的语言模型。虽然它有一些开放的方面，例如商业用途权重的可用性，但也有一些与开源精神背道而驰的限制。然而，作者认为“开源”一词需要在人工智能模型领域不断发展。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#in-the-llm-space-open-source-is-being-used-to-mean-downloadable-weights" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815255" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;关于儿童期虐待与多动症之间关系的纵向研究</stitle>; <id>;https://www.psypost.org/2023/07/longitudinal-study-highlights-bidirection-relationship- Between-childhood-maltreatment-and-adhd-symptoms-166568</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21 T17:22:07.958010Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.psypost.org/2023/07/longitudinal-study-highlights-bidirect-relationship- Between-childhood-maltreatment-and-adhd-symptoms-166568"/>; <作者>; <name>;geox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.psypost.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/upset-young-boy-sitting-and-crying-sad-750x375.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：110px;" />;<br />;新研究提供了儿童虐待与多动症症状之间双向关联的证据。更容易心烦意乱和烦躁的婴儿长大后更有可能出现多动症症状。这些婴儿也更有可能遭受虐待，例如虐待或忽视。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#longitudinal-study-on-the-relationship- Between-childhood-maltreatment-and-adhd" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36816436" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;内置人体脑组织的计算机芯片获得军事资助</stitle>; <id>;https://newatlas .com/computers/ human-brain-chip-ai/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T23:22:07.958704Z</updated>; <link href="https://newatlas.com/computers/ human-brain-chip-ai/"/>; <author>; <name>;clumsysmurf</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=clumsysmurf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.newatlas.com/dims4/default/51e8521/2147483647/strip/true/crop/1344x896+0+0/resize/1200x800!/quality/90/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fnewatlas-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com% 2F83%2F70%2F1d37aa81476bbc3534b48a2120d1%2Floz9501-a-计算机芯片-带有一些-人类大脑组织-in-a-small-95451b8c-01dc-4613-8dff-14df00131c92.png" style="width: 220px;高度：147px;" />;<br />;去年，莫纳什大学的科学家们创造了“DishBrain”——一种半生物计算机芯片，其电极中含有约 800,000 个人类和小鼠的脑细胞。通过展示感知能力，它在五分钟内学会了打乒乓球。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#computer-chip-with-built-in- human-brain-tissue-gets-milit ary-funding" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821266" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;暗黑破坏神</stitle>; <id>;https://www.filfre.net/20 23/07/diablo/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T17:22:07.960476Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.filfre.net/2023/07/diablo/"/>; <作者>; <name>;doppp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=doppp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://www.filfre.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/6117082-diablo-windows-front-cover-236x300.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 281px;" />;<br />;《暗黑破坏神》的创作者 David Brevik 和 Schaefer 兄弟对 20 世纪 90 年代中期电脑 RPG 的发展方向感到失望。他们想创造一款剥离过多故事和统计数据、专注于令人上瘾的游戏玩法的游戏。他们在暴雪娱乐找到了合作伙伴，暴雪娱乐刚刚发布了《魔兽争霸》，正在寻找下一个大项目。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#diablo" target ="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815781" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
